column4: The character device /dev/vboxdrv does not exist. Please install the virtualbox-ose-source package and the appropriate headers, most likely  linux-headers-2.6.34. I keep getting this error when executing "virtualbox" Please tell me how to solve it. I want to run Vista on it.
Can someone atleast point out whs wrong?at
try doing /etc/init.d/vboxdrv restart, then running virtualbox.
